DOC.brief_title: Exercise Intervention Pts With Metastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer Receiving Abiraterone Enzalutamide
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize pilot study conduct men metastatic castration resistant prostate cancer ( mCRPC ) within 3 month initiate abiraterone enzalutamide . The purpose pilot study evaluate effect 12 week exercise intervention mCRPC patient recently start additional androgen suppression therapy . The investigator also explore effect exercise train biomarkers inflammation-hormonal status potential association change lean mass function .
